name: fda-app-build
description: utility for nightly build for FDA 3.0 Applications

scripts.patch-apps: cd apps/ && git clone https://github.com/centralizedinc/fda-approver-portal.git && cd fda-approver-portal && npm run patch-approver
scripts.patch-encoder: cd apps/fda-encoder-portal && git pull && date >> .build-log && npm run push
scripts.patch-admin: cd apps/fda-admin-portal && git pull && date >> .build-log && npm run push
scripts.patch-client: cd apps/fda-client-portal && git pull && date >> .build-log && npm run push

author: abalita@centralizedinc.com
